definition: Zhang Yi (1608-1695), prolific author and poet spanning interregnum between Ming and Qing
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: The Arrow Factory is pleased to present Touch Would, a new work by New York based artist Patty Chang.
